content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1627027772686{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/banner-our-team.jpg?id=9053) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”center right” visibility=”hidden-desktop”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md” css=”.vc_custom_1570203400228{background-color: rgba(216,216,216,0.9) !important;*background-color: rgb(216,216,216) !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ text_align=”center”]

The Good Painter – Meet Our Team

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
Get an online quote now
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1628690246220{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/banner-our-team.jpg?id=9053) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”center center” visibility=”hidden-phone”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1628690214448{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 500px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_row_inner el_class=”.page-container”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1628690483313{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#ffffff”]

The Good Painter – Meet Our Team

[/vc_column_text]
Get an online quote now
[vc_column_text color=”#ffffff”]
  • All of our painters and decorators have a minimum of five years experience, mostly painting London properties.
  • Extended Health & Safety, Insurance, and Warranty.
  • The most customer-centric painting and decorating service in London.
  • Knowledge and use of only high-quality materials and tools
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” typography_style=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1627029774812{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1627029739005{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

The Team Behind The Good Painter:
Team of experienced painters and decorators

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1627029387903{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”icons_whyus”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9077″ css=”.vc_custom_1627029414401{margin-bottom: -20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1567493335828{margin-top: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text text_align=”left” color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1627036044584{padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}” font_family=”Playfair Display” font_size=”19″]

Behind the brushes and colour swatches, there is a team of experts making the magic happen

[/vc_column_text]

Experience and Quality

[vc_column_text text_align=”left”]It takes 10,000 hours to be considered an expert. We are passionate about quality work. All of our painters and decorators have a minimum of five years experience, mostly painting London properties. They paint every day, all day! These experts have earned their stripes through hard graft, meticulous attention to detail, and an eye for perfection. Efficiency, accuracy, and a professional finish; right from the start.[/vc_column_text]

Can-Do Attitude

[vc_column_text text_align=”left”]We will work through the night to deliver a project on time. Every job is important to us, regardless of the scale or complexity. We love little rooms just as much as large loft flats. It’s amazing what a lick of paint and a little bit of love can do to a space! Our painters and decorators have the know-how, passion, and skills, when painting London houses and commercial spaces.[/vc_column_text]

Flexible and Friendly

[vc_column_text text_align=”left”]We know how important your project is, so we won’t rest until you are delighted with the result. Have you changed your mind about the colour in the middle of the project? No problem. We aim to be the most customer-centric painting and decorating service in London. If you want it, we will bend over backwards make it happen. Trust our painters and decorators to transform your space into new reality.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_separator border_width=”4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Our Experienced Team Leaders

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

We deliver excellent commercial painting and decorating services in London

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”9107″ img_size=”500×500″ alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Norbert

[vc_column_text text_align=”center” color=”#404040″ font_size=”15″]

Project Manager

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_size=”18″]Professional and highly motivated individual with skills in many aspects of the high-end construction industry. Norbert adapts quick problem-solving solutions to clients and project requirements on all sector of works.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”9108″ img_size=”500×500″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Martin

[vc_column_text text_align=”center” color=”#404040″ font_size=”15″]

Team Leader

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_size=”18″]Martin has 12 years of experience and is our wallpapering specialist and expert. Containing the understanding of the best materials and tools to use when delivering the job, Martin excels every residential and commercial project.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”9109″ img_size=”500×500″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Gregory

[vc_column_text text_align=”center” color=”#404040″ font_size=”15″]

Team Leader

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_size=”18″]Extremely experienced in painting and decorating, specialising in exceptional finishes techniques. Gregory has the utmost attention to detail for that quality and clean finish when delivering services for every project.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”9110″ img_size=”500×500″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Michael

[vc_column_text text_align=”center” color=”#404040″ font_size=”15″]

Team Leader

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_size=”18″]Our high-end residential experienced team leader, Michael is notably skilled in taking care of residential properties and transforming them into the space of your dreams. High-level skill in interior and exterior painting.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627031531719{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552509497433{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#ffffff”]

Get your London residential or commercial space transformed by our superb painters and decorators

[/vc_column_text]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1569575520745{margin-left: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1627032124175{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” font_size=”32″]

Painting and decorating projects we have delivered across London

[/vc_column_text]

Before and After: A chic and stylish painting and decorating makeover for a busy London businesswoman

When Ana first came to us, she had just become the owner of a two-bedroom…

Success story: Painting and decorating a four-storey family house in Chelsea, London

Yasmina and Labib moved into a five-bedroom house in Chelsea, London a number of years…

Before and After: First Home, First Painting and Decorating Experience for Young Couple

Buying a first property is always exciting but can be challenging - especially for a…

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Contact us

Call us

0207 760 7672

Whats App us

0796 135 6442

Office Open

Mon-Fri 8am-6pm

Email us

info@thegoodpainter.co.uk

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Client’s story Buying a first property is always exciting but can be challenging - especially for a young couple when the budget is tight and ambitions are high. Zoe and Dominic found a compact but cosy terraced house in Shepherds Bush. Perhaps it looked a little dated, but to them it had great potential with…
